participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: curious and adventurous, loves to explore new ideas.
participant_1.background: i walk dogs for a living. i'm also a graduate student. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: creative and nurturing, finds joy in crafting and helping others.
participant_2.background: i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

content.text: i love dogs. do you have any?
what breed of dog is your labrador? mine is a labrador.
